meta.description: Determine the minimum number of chain stores to be built such that every residential area is within 800 meters of at least one store.

sets.name: AREAS
sets.description: Residential areas where chain stores can be built

params.name: coverage
params.description: Areas within 800 meters radius of each residential area

vars.name: y
vars.description: 1 if a chain store is built in the area, 0 otherwise

objective.name: min_total_stores
objective.description: Minimize the total number of chain stores built

constraints.name: coverage_A
constraints.description: Area A must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_B
constraints.description: Area B must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_C
constraints.description: Area C must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_D
constraints.description: Area D must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_E
constraints.description: Area E must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_F
constraints.description: Area F must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_G
constraints.description: Area G must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_H
constraints.description: Area H must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_I
constraints.description: Area I must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_J
constraints.description: Area J must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_K
constraints.description: Area K must be covered by at least one store

constraints.name: coverage_L
constraints.description: Area L must be covered by at least one store
